column1: Little Goat Diner////The portions are generous. I saw many couples splitting food. The two of us got a goat burger (no bun
column2: nice lettuce) fried chicken (surprisingly good! Recommended by wine spectator they said?) and a bowl of goat chili and took home 2 small meals worth.  I got their drink special of cinnamon and masala
column4: and it was small but potent. My son said he could still smell the spice on me the next morning!  The food was just really
column5: really good. Definitely would be happy to go again.
